trans-unit.source: WebSockets is a web technology providing full-duplex communications channels over a single TCP connection. The WebSocket protocol was standardized by the IETF as RFC 6455 in 2011.

WebSockets is a web technology providing full-duplex communications channels over a single TCP connection. The WebSocket protocol was standardized by the IETF as RFC 6455 in 2011. QWebSocket can both be used in a client application and server application.

trans-unit.source: Whatever form the underlying data structure takes, it is usually a good idea to supplement the standard QAbstractItemModel API in specialized models with one that allows more natural access to the underlying data structure. This makes it easier to populate the model with data, yet still enables other general model/view components to interact with it using the standard API. The model described below provides a custom constructor for just this purpose.
trans-unit.target: Cualquiera que sea la forma que adopte la estructura de datos subyacente, suele ser una buena idea complementar la API estándar QAbstractItemModel en modelos especializados con una que permita un acceso más natural a la estructura de datos subyacente. Esto hace que sea más fácil completar el modelo con datos, pero aún permite que otros componentes generales del modelo / vista interactúen con él usando la API estándar. El modelo que se describe a continuación proporciona un constructor personalizado solo para este propósito.

trans-unit.source: Wheel events are sent to the widget under the mouse cursor, but if that widget does not handle the event they are sent to the focus widget. Wheel events are generated for both mouse wheels and trackpad scroll gestures. There are two ways to read the wheel event delta: angleDelta() returns the delta in wheel degrees. This value is always provided. pixelDelta() returns the delta in screen pixels and is available on platforms that have high-resolution trackpads, such as macOS. If that is the case, source() will return Qt::MouseEventSynthesizedBySystem.
trans-unit.target: Los eventos de rueda se envían al widget debajo del cursor del mouse, pero si ese widget no maneja el evento, se envían al widget de enfoque. Los eventos de rueda se generan tanto para las ruedas del mouse como para los gestos de desplazamiento del trackpad. Hay dos formas de leer el delta del evento de rueda: angleDelta () devuelve el delta en grados de rueda. Este valor siempre se proporciona. pixelDelta () devuelve el delta en píxeles de pantalla y está disponible en plataformas que tienen trackpads de alta resolución, como macOS . Si ese es el caso, source () devolverá Qt :: MouseEventSynthesizedBySystem .

trans-unit.source: Wheel events are sent to the widget under the mouse cursor, but if that widget does not handle the event they are sent to the focus widget. Wheel events are generated for both mouse wheels and trackpad scroll gestures. There are two ways to read the wheel event delta: angleDelta() returns the deltas in wheel degrees. These values are always provided. pixelDelta() returns the deltas in screen pixels, and is available on platforms that have high-resolution trackpads, such as macOS. If that is the case, device()->type() will return QInputDevice::DeviceType::Touchpad.

These values are always provided. pixelDelta() returns the deltas in screen pixels, and is available on platforms that have high-resolution trackpads, such as macOS. If that is the case, source() will return Qt::MouseEventSynthesizedBySystem.

trans-unit.source: WheelHandler (QML type)
WheelHandler QML Type

WheelHandler handles only a rotating mouse wheel by default. Optionally it can handle smooth-scrolling events from touchpad gestures, by setting acceptedDevices to PointerDevice.Mouse | PointerDevice.TouchPad.

WheelHandler is a handler that is used to interactively manipulate some numeric property of an Item as the user rotates the mouse wheel. Like other Input Handlers, by default it manipulates its target. Declare property to control which target property will be manipulated:

trans-unit.source: When rendererType is Shape.GeometryRenderer, the input path is triangulated on the CPU during the polishing phase of the Shape. This is potentially expensive. To offload this work to separate worker threads, set this property to true.
trans-unit.target: Cuando rendererType es Shape.GeometryRenderer , la ruta de entrada se triangula en la CPU durante la fase de pulido de Shape. Esto es potencialmente caro. Para descargar este trabajo en subprocesos de trabajo separados, establezca esta propiedad en true .

trans-unit.target: Cuando joinStyle se establece en ShapePath.MiterJoin , esta propiedad especifica cuánto puede extenderse la unión a inglete desde el punto de unión.

trans-unit.source: When WheelHandler handles events that contain scroll phase information, such as events from some touchpads, the active property will become false as soon as an event with phase Qt::ScrollEnd is received; in that case the timeout is not necessary. But a conventional mouse with a wheel does not provide a scroll phase: the mouse cannot detect when the user has decided to stop scrolling, so the active property transitions to false after this much time has elapsed.

When WheelHandler handles events that contain scroll phase information, such as events from some touchpads, the active property will become false as soon as an event with phase Qt::ScrollEnd is received; in that case the timeout is not necessary. But a conventional mouse with a wheel does not provide the scroll phase: the mouse cannot detect when the user has decided to stop scrolling, so the active property transitions to false after this much time has elapsed.

trans-unit.source: When create() is called with native handles set, QOpenGLContext does not take ownership of the handles, so destroying the QOpenGLContext does not destroy the native context.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a create () con los identificadores nativos establecidos, QOpenGLContext no se hace cargo de los identificadores, por lo que destruir QOpenGLContext no destruye el contexto nativo.

trans-unit.source: When QPainter::begin() is called, the QPrinter it operates on is prepared for a new page, enabling the QPainter to be used immediately to paint the first page in a document. Once the first page has been painted, newPage() can be called to request a new blank page to paint on, or QPainter::end() can be called to finish printing. The second page and all following pages are prepared using a call to newPage() before they are painted.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a QPainter :: begin (), la QPrinter en la que opera se prepara para una nueva página, lo que permite que QPainter se utilice inmediatamente para pintar la primera página de un documento. Una vez que se ha pintado la primera página, se puede llamar a newPage () para solicitar una nueva página en blanco para pintar, o se puede llamar a QPainter :: end () para finalizar la impresión. La segunda página y todas las páginas siguientes se preparan mediante una llamada a newPage () antes de pintarlas .

trans-unit.source: When QPainter::begin() is called, the QPrinter it operates on is prepared for a new page, enabling the QPainter to be used immediately to paint the first page in a document. Once the first page has been painted, newPage() can be called to request a new blank page to paint on, or QPainter::end() can be called to finish printing. The second page and all following pages are prepared using a call to newPage() before they are painted.

trans-unit.source: When polish() is called, the scene graph schedules a polish event for this item. When the scene graph is ready to render this item, it calls updatePolish() to do any item layout as required before it renders the next frame.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a polish (), el gráfico de escena programa un evento de pulido para este elemento. Cuando el gráfico de escena está listo para representar este elemento, llama a updatePolish () para realizar cualquier diseño de elemento según sea necesario antes de representar el siguiente fotograma.

trans-unit.source: When QRegExpValidator determines whether a string is Acceptable or not, the regexp is treated as if it begins with the start of string assertion (^) and ends with the end of string assertion ($); the match is against the entire input string, or from the given position if a start position greater than zero is given.
trans-unit.target: Cuando QRegExpValidator determina si una cadena es aceptable o no, la expresión regular se trata como si comenzara con el inicio de la aserción de cadena ( ^ ) y terminara con el final de la aserción de cadena ( $ ); la coincidencia es contra toda la cadena de entrada, o desde la posición dada si se da una posición de inicio mayor que cero.

trans-unit.source: When QSensor::connectToBackend() is called, the createBackend() function will be called.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a QSensor :: connectToBackend (), se llamará a la función createBackend ().

trans-unit.source: When QSpinBox paints itself, it creates a QStyleOptionSpinBox and asks the style to draw CC_SpinBox. The edit field is a line edit that is a child of the spin box. The dimensions of the field are calculated by the style with SC_SpinBoxEditField.
trans-unit.target: Cuando QSpinBox se pinta a sí mismo, crea un QStyleOptionSpinBox y le pide al estilo que dibuje CC_SpinBox . El campo de edición es una edición de línea que es un elemento secundario del cuadro de número. Las dimensiones del campo se calculan mediante el estilo con SC_SpinBoxEditField .

trans-unit.source: When QStyledItemDelegate paints its items, it draws CE_ItemViewItem, and calculates their size with CT_ItemViewItem. Note also that it uses SE_ItemViewItemText to set the size of editors. When implementing a style to customize drawing of item views, you need to check the implementation of QCommonStyle (and any other subclasses from which your style inherits). This way, you find out which and how other style elements are painted, and you can then reimplement the painting of elements that should be drawn differently.
trans-unit.target: Cuando QStyledItemDelegate pinta sus elementos, dibuja CE_ItemViewItem y calcula su tamaño con CT_ItemViewItem . Tenga en cuenta también que utiliza SE_ItemViewItemText para establecer el tamaño de los editores. Al implementar un estilo para personalizar el dibujo de las vistas de elementos, debe verificar la implementación de QCommonStyle (y cualquier otra subclase de la que herede su estilo). De esta manera, averigua cuáles y cómo se pintan otros elementos de estilo, y luego puede volver a implementar la pintura de los elementos que deberían dibujarse de manera diferente.

trans-unit.source: When setDefaultFormat() is not called, this is a default-constructed QSurfaceFormat.
trans-unit.target: Cuando no se llama a setDefaultFormat (), este es un QSurfaceFormat construido por defecto .

trans-unit.source: When QTextBlocks are created, the defaultTextOption is set on their QTextLayout. This allows setting global properties for the document such as the default word wrap mode.

trans-unit.source: When QTimeLine is in Running state, this value is updated continuously as a function of the duration and direction of the timeline. Otherwise, it is value that was current when stop() was called last, or the value set by setCurrentTime().
trans-unit.target: Cuando QTimeLine está en estado de ejecución, este valor se actualiza continuamente en función de la duración y la dirección de la línea de tiempo. De lo contrario, es el valor que era actual cuando se llamó a stop () por última vez, o el valor establecido por setCurrentTime ().

trans-unit.source: When Transitions are used to animate state changes, they animate properties from their values in the current state to those defined in the new state (as defined by PropertyChanges objects). However, it is sometimes desirable to set a property value

When Transitions are used to animate state changes, they animate properties from their values in the current state to those defined in the new state (as defined by PropertyChanges objects). However, it is sometimes desirable to set a property value
trans-unit.target: Cuando las transiciones se utilizan para animar cambios de estado, animan las propiedades desde sus valores en el estado actual a los definidos en el nuevo estado (según lo definido por los objetos PropertyChanges ). Sin embargo, a veces es conveniente establecer un valor de propiedad

trans-unit.source: When supportsGrab() returns true, QVulkanWindow can perform readbacks from the color buffer into a QImage. grab() is a slow and inefficient operation, so frequent usage should be avoided. It is nonetheless valuable since it allows applications to take screenshots, or tools and tests to process and verify the output of the GPU rendering.
trans-unit.target: Cuando supportsGrab () devuelve verdadero, QVulkanWindow puede realizar lecturas desde el búfer de color a una QImage . grab () es una operación lenta e ineficiente, por lo que se debe evitar el uso frecuente. No obstante, es valioso ya que permite que las aplicaciones tomen capturas de pantalla o herramientas y pruebas para procesar y verificar el resultado del renderizado de la GPU.

trans-unit.source: When supportsGrab() returns true, QVulkanWindow can perform readbacks from the color buffer into a QImage. grab() is a slow and inefficient operation, so frequent usage should be avoided. It is nonetheless valuable since it allows applications to take screenshots, or tools and tests to process and verify the output of the GPU rendering.

When QXmlQuery accesses resources (e.g., calling fn:doc() to load a file, or accessing a device via a bound variable), the event loop is used, which means events will be processed. To avoid processing events when QXmlQuery accesses resources, create your QXmlQuery instance in a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: Cuando QXmlQuery accede a los recursos (p. Ej., Llamando a fn:doc() para cargar un archivo o accediendo a un dispositivo a través de una variable vinculada), se utiliza el bucle de eventos, lo que significa que los eventos se procesarán. Para evitar procesar eventos cuando QXmlQuery accede a los recursos, cree su instancia de QXmlQuery en un hilo separado.

trans-unit.source: When setQuery() is called, the query text is compiled into an internal data structure and optimized. The optimized form can then be reused for multiple evaluations of the query. Since the compile-and-optimize process can be expensive, repeating it for the same query should be avoided by using a separate instance of QXmlQuery for each query text.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a setQuery (), el texto de la consulta se compila en una estructura de datos interna y se optimiza. El formulario optimizado se puede reutilizar para múltiples evaluaciones de la consulta. Dado que el proceso de compilación y optimización puede ser costoso, se debe evitar repetirlo para la misma consulta utilizando una instancia separada de QXmlQuery para cada texto de consulta.

Note that some platforms may return windows with a sRGB-capable default framebuffer even when not requested explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la GL_ARB_framebuffer_sRGB GL_EXT_framebuffer_sRGB GL_ARB_framebuffer_sRGB o GL_EXT_framebuffer_sRGB y se establece este valor, la ventana se creará con un framebuffer predeterminado compatible con sRGB. Tenga en cuenta que algunas plataformas pueden devolver ventanas con un framebuffer predeterminado compatible con sRGB incluso cuando no se solicite explícitamente.

trans-unit.source: When QT_OPENGL_BUGLIST is not specified, a built-in list will be used. This typically includes some older, less-capable graphics cards with disable_desktopgl set, in order to prevent Qt from using their unstable desktop OpenGL implementations and instead fall back to ANGLE right away.

When QT_OPENGL_BUGLIST is not specified, a built-in list will be used. This typically includes some older, less-capable graphics cards with disable_desktopgl set, in order to prevent Qt from using their unstable desktop OpenGL implementations and instead fall back to attempting to load the software-based alternative library right away.
When button is clicked, the machine will transition into state s2, which will set the geometry of the button, and then pop up a message box to alert the user that the geometry has been changed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando button se hace clic, la máquina realizará la transición al estado s2 , que establecerá la geometría del botón y, a continuación, aparecerá un cuadro de mensaje para alertar al usuario de que la geometría ha sido cambiado.

trans-unit.source: When mode is not defined, the mode that is reported as preferred by the system is chosen. The accepted values for mode are: off, current, preferred, skip, widthxheight, widthxheight@vrefresh, or a modeline string.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el mode no está definido, se elige el modo que el sistema informa como preferido. Los valores aceptados para el mode son: off , current , preferred , skip , ancho x alto, ancho x alto @ vrefresh o una cadena de línea de modelo.

trans-unit.source: When mode is not defined, the system's preferred mode is chosen. The accepted values for mode are: off, current, preferred, skip, widthxheight, widthxheight@vrefresh, or a modeline string.

Thus when updating anchors within JavaScript, you should first unset any anchors that are no longer required, and only then set any new anchors that are required, as shown below:
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama reanchorToRight , la función primero establece el ancla derecha. trans-unit.source: When DPI scaling is used by the system, the logical surface size, which is used by mouse events, and the actual 'physical' size of the surface can differ. The surfacePixelRatio is the factor to convert the logical size to the physical size.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el sistema utiliza la escala DPI, el tamaño de la superficie lógica, que utilizan los eventos del ratón, y el tamaño "físico" real de la superficie pueden diferir. El surfacePixelRatio es el factor para convertir el tamaño lógico para el tamaño físico.

trans-unit.source: When FPS measuring is enabled, the results for the last second are stored in this read-only property. It takes at least a second before this value updates after measuring is activated.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se activa la medición de FPS,los resultados del último segundo se almacenan en esta propiedad de sólo lectura.Toma por lo menos un segundo antes de que este valor se actualice después de que se active la medición.

trans-unit.source: When HSTS is enabled, for each HTTP response containing HSTS header and received over a secure transport, QNetworkAccessManager will update its HSTS cache, either remembering a host with a valid policy or removing a host with an expired or disabled HSTS policy.
trans-unit.target: Cuando HSTS está habilitado, para cada respuesta HTTP que contiene un encabezado HSTS y se recibe a través de un transporte seguro, QNetworkAccessManager actualizará su caché HSTS, ya sea recordando un host con una política válida o eliminando un host con una política HSTS caducada o inhabilitada.

trans-unit.source: When HTML markup is used for text, Qt follows the rules defined by the HTML 4 specification. This includes default properties for text layout, such as the direction of the text flow (left-to-right) which can be changed by applying the dir attribute to blocks of text.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se usa el marcado HTML para texto, Qt sigue las reglas definidas por la especificación HTML 4 . Esto incluye propiedades predeterminadas para el diseño del texto, como la dirección del flujo del texto (de izquierda a derecha) que se puede cambiar aplicando el atributo dir a los bloques de texto.

trans-unit.source: When HTML markup is used for text, Qt follows the rules defined by the HTML 4 specification. This includes default properties for text layout, such as the direction of the text flow (left-to-right) which can be changed by applying the dir attribute to blocks of text.

When HTML markup is used for text, Qt follows the rules defined by the HTML 4 specification. This includes default properties for text layout, such as the direction of the text flow (left-to-right) which can be changed by applying the dir attribute to blocks of text.
When LayoutDirectionAuto is used in conjunction with text layouting, it will imply that the text directionality is determined from the content of the string to be layouted.
trans-unit.target: Cuando LayoutDirectionAuto se utiliza junto con la disposición del texto,implicará que la direccionalidad del texto se determina a partir del contenido de la cadena a ser dispuesta.

trans-unit.source: When QDoc generates documentation for a project, it will also generate an .index file containing URLs to each linkable entity in the project. Each dependency is a (lowercase) name of a project. This name must match with the base name of the index file generated for that project.
When QML types produce logging messages, it improves traceability if they include the QML file and line number on which the particular instance was instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Cuando los tipos QML producen mensajes de registro,mejora la trazabilidad si incluyen el archivo QML y el número de línea en el que se instanció la instancia particular.

When Qt5 came along, Qt was divided into modules. Since then, many new modules have been added to Qt. As of version 5.5, there are over 40 separate modules in Qt5, each with its own documentation that links to (depends on) the documentation of other Qt modules.
trans-unit.target: Cuando apareció Qt5,Qt se dividió en módulos.Desde entonces,se han añadido muchos módulos nuevos a Qt.A partir de la versión 5.5,hay más de 40 módulos separados en Qt5,cada uno con su propia documentación que enlaza con (depende de)la documentación de otros módulos de Qt.

trans-unit.source: When ScrollBar is attached vertically or horizontally to a Flickable, its geometry and the following properties are automatically set and updated as appropriate:

When a QFile is opened using this function, behaviour of close() is controlled by the AutoCloseHandle flag. If AutoCloseHandle is specified, and this function succeeds, then calling close() closes the adopted handle. Otherwise, close() does not actually close the file, but only flushes it.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se abre un QFile usando esta función, el comportamiento de close () es controlado por el indicador AutoCloseHandle . Si se especifica AutoCloseHandle , y esta función tiene éxito, al llamar a close () se cierra el identificador adoptado. De lo contrario, close () no cierra realmente el archivo, solo lo vacía.

trans-unit.source: When a QGraphicsView receives Qt mouse, keyboard, and drag and drop events (QMouseEvent, QKeyEvent, QDragEvent, etc.), it translates them into instances of QGraphicsSceneEvent subclasses and forwards them to the QGraphicsScene it displays. The scene then forwards the events to the relevant items.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QGraphicsView recibe Qt mouse, teclado y eventos de arrastrar y soltar ( QMouseEvent , QKeyEvent , QDragEvent, etc.), los traduce a instancias de subclases QGraphicsSceneEvent y los reenvía al QGraphicsScene que muestra. Luego, la escena reenvía los eventos a los elementos relevantes.

trans-unit.source: When a QGraphicsView receives Qt mouse, keyboard, and drag and drop events (QMouseEvent, QKeyEvent, QDragEvent, etc.), it translates them into instances of QGraphicsSceneEvent subclasses and forwards them to the QGraphicsScene it displays. The scene then forwards the events to the relevant items.

When a QGraphicsView receives a QEvent of type QEvent::ToolTip, it creates a QGraphicsSceneHelpEvent, which is forwarded to the scene. You can set a tooltip on a QGraphicsItem with setToolTip(); by default QGraphicsScene displays the tooltip of the QGraphicsItem with the highest z-value (i.e, the top-most item) under the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QGraphicsView recibe un QEvent de tipo QEvent :: ToolTip , crea un QGraphicsSceneHelpEvent , que se reenvía a la escena. Puede establecer una información sobre herramientas en un QGraphicsItem con setToolTip () ; de forma predeterminada, QGraphicsScene muestra la información sobre herramientas de QGraphicsItem con el valor z más alto (es decir, el elemento más alto) debajo de la posición del mouse.

trans-unit.source: When a QGraphicsView receives a QEvent of type QEvent::ToolTip, it creates a QGraphicsSceneHelpEvent, which is forwarded to the scene. You can set a tooltip on a QGraphicsItem with setToolTip(); by default QGraphicsScene displays the tooltip of the QGraphicsItem with the highest z-value (i.e, the top-most item) under the mouse position.
When a QGraphicsView receives a QHoverEvent event, it translates it into QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent. The event is then forwarded to the QGraphicsScene associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QGraphicsView recibe un evento QHoverEvent , lo traduce a QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent . Luego, el evento se reenvía al QGraphicsScene asociado con la vista.

trans-unit.source: When a QGraphicsView receives a QHoverEvent event, it translates it into QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent. The event is then forwarded to the QGraphicsScene associated with the view.

When a QGraphicsView receives a QMouseEvent, it translates it to a QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent. The event is then forwarded to the QGraphicsScene associated with the view. If the event is not handled by the scene, the view may use it, e.g., for the DragMode.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QGraphicsView recibe un QMouseEvent , lo traduce a un QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent . Luego, el evento se reenvía al QGraphicsScene asociado con la vista. Si el evento no es manejado por la escena, la vista puede usarlo, por ejemplo, para DragMode .

trans-unit.source: When a QGraphicsView receives a QMouseEvent, it translates it to a QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent. The event is then forwarded to the QGraphicsScene associated with the view. If the event is not handled by the scene, the view may use it, e.g., for the DragMode.

trans-unit.source: When a QObject calls updateAccessibility(), clients that are listening to events are notified of the change. The function is used to post events to the assistive technology, and accessible events are posted by updateAccessibility().
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QObject llama a updateAccessibility () , los clientes que están escuchando eventos reciben una notificación del cambio. La función se utiliza para publicar eventos en la tecnología de asistencia, y los eventos accesibles se publican mediante updateAccessibility () .

trans-unit.source: When a QObject calls updateAccessibility(), clients that are listening to events are notified of the change. The function is used to post events to the assistive technology, and accessible events are posted by updateAccessibility().

trans-unit.source: When a QObject is moved to another thread, all its children will be automatically moved too.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un QObject se mueve a otro hilo, todos sus hijos también se moverán automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: When a QObject is passed to the QJSEngine::newQObject() function, a Qt Script wrapper object is created that can be used to make the QObject's signals, slots, properties, and child objects available to scripts.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se pasa un QObject a la función QJSEngine :: newQObject (), se crea un objeto contenedor Qt Script que se puede usar para hacer que las señales, ranuras, propiedades y objetos secundarios del QObject estén disponibles para los scripts.

trans-unit.source: When a QQuickWindow instance is deliberately hidden with hide() or setVisible(false), it will stop rendering and its scene graph and graphics context might be released. The sceneGraphInvalidated() signal will be emitted when this happens.
trans-unit.target: Cuando una instancia de QQuickWindow se oculta deliberadamente con hide () o setVisible (false), dejará de renderizarse y su escenario gráfico y su contexto gráfico podrían liberarse. La señal sceneGraphInvalidated () se emitirá cuando esto suceda.

trans-unit.source: When a QMemoryBarrier node is found in a FrameGraph branch, the barrier will be enforced prior to any draw or compute command even if these are defined deeper in the branch.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se encuentra un nodo QMemoryBarrier en una rama FrameGraph, la barrera se aplicará antes de cualquier comando de dibujo o cálculo, incluso si estos se definen más profundamente en la rama.

When a Qt3DRender::QNoPicking node is present in a FrameGraph branch, this prevents the render aspect from performing picking selection for the given branch. More...

When a QToolBar is not a child of a QMainWindow, it loses the ability to populate the extension pop up with widgets added to the toolbar using addWidget(). Please use widget actions created by inheriting QWidgetAction and implementing QWidgetAction::createWidget() instead.
trans-unit.target: Cuando una QToolBar no es hija de una QMainWindow , pierde la capacidad de completar la ventana emergente de extensión con widgets agregados a la barra de herramientas usando addWidget (). Utilice acciones de widget creadas heredando QWidgetAction e implementando QWidgetAction :: createWidget () en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: When a subTitle is set, QWizard displays it in a header, in which case it also uses the BannerPixmap and the LogoPixmap to decorate the header. The WatermarkPixmap is displayed on the left side, below the header. At the bottom, there is a row of buttons allowing the user to navigate through the pages.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se establece un subtítulo , QWizard lo muestra en un encabezado, en cuyo caso también usa BannerPixmap y LogoPixmap para decorar el encabezado. El WatermarkPixmap se muestra en el lado izquierdo, debajo del encabezado. En la parte inferior, hay una fila de botones que permiten al usuario navegar por las páginas.

trans-unit.source: When a subTitle is set, QWizard displays it in a header, in which case it also uses the BannerPixmap and the LogoPixmap to decorate the header. The WatermarkPixmap is displayed on the left side, below the header. At the bottom, there is a row of buttons allowing the user to navigate through the pages.
